title: Publisher Rocket - Keyword Research for Book Titles - Bitcoin / Crypto
description:
In this video, I show you how I use Publisher Rocket to do keyword research for book titles and topics on Amazon KDP. You’ll see a real example using Bitcoin and cryptocurrency keywords, and how to check search demand, competition, and which terms are worth targeting.

Get Publisher Rocket Here 👉 https://kbrea--rocket.thrivecart.com/publisher-rocket/

👉 I’ll also cover:
Why avoiding trademarked terms (like “for Dummies”) is so important
The challenges of targeting Bitcoin (high competition)
Smarter keyword alternatives like cryptocurrency with lower competition and solid search volume

If you’re a self-published author or indie writer, this video will help you choose better keywords for your book titles so you can get more visibility and sales on Amazon.

👉 Suggested hashtags for this description:
#PublisherRocket #KDPSelfPublishing #KeywordResearch #AmazonKDP #BookMarketing
